评论详情: The first dress  was a nice fit and that's why i ordered another one, same size different color.  The second one was disappointing - different cut, baggy and uneven - sending it back!

I adore this dress. The only weird/annoying thing is how much it shifts back to front. Though the straps are adjustable, there's no seam near the bust or shoulders to keep the dress secured on my top half, so it can ride up. I find myself picking at the dress to pull it down to where I'd adjusted the straps in the mirror.  A minor issue in the grand scheme, I suppose, but still worth knocking a star off.
So comfy and I got compliments every time I wear it. Had to go buy another color!

Bought this dress to wear in Mexico. The first time I wore, it was to dinner. As soon as I sat down, the strap popped and came down if I had not had on a cover-up over that dress, my boob would’ve been hanging out. Upon looking at it, the strap Was not properly sewn.
This dress is beautiful. It looks so much better in person than in the photo I went and ordered another one. Perfect for summer day or night highly recommend
I get a lot of compliments when I wear this dress and so comfortable.
I live in these dresses during the summer. Very comfortable
Size down

Not cheap fabric as so many of the flowy women's clothes are on Amazon, but rather a deliciously soft and flowy dress that was absolutely perfect for what I needed. I've bought another in a different color because I love the way this feels and fits.
I love that dress for my friend’s wedding party. Thank you ❤️

Loved the light and cool material. The dress was very complimenting.
Dress is nice. I wear around house or after shower.

I simply LOVE this dress. I am petite, 5’1” and 140 pounds, i got medium, it’s simply beautiful. Love the material and I love th e feel in it. I just ordered two more colors. Only thing I wish it had are pockets 😅
My new favorite go to dress, gorgeous color, perfect fit and excellent material

Frayed at the v neck on my chest the 1st time hand washing/hang to dry .. no 2nd time wearing. Also there is an unsightly seam that goes straight down the front and there's also one on the back. Lol why didn't they put the dream on the sides?  Why is the chest seams already coming undone? Ugh I thought I had found "the" beach dress. Nope.  I would have been better off buying a dress at Walmart or Roses. So much cheaper two. You could have gotten 3 dresses  Now I have to make sure I take this back on time, which I'm horrible at, to get my money back. Ugh
Love this dress. It fits nice, flowy but looks great on. Will buy in more colors!
I wish this came in more colors and designs with this material. Comfortable and flattering fit. People have complimented me on my other dresses like this.
They fit well .  True to size and the patterns are beautiful. I love these dresses.

Bought 2 different sizes…2xl and xl. 2xl was Amazons recommendation and xl is what I would normally wear. The xl fits great. 2xl is borderline too big…I can pull it off with a trick or 2. Love, love the material and the colors. Only critique….needs pockets. Will buy more. Thank you
Not high quality, but fine for summer wear. Looks really cute even on plus sized person!
I love the dress. It's very light weight and flowy, and is perfect for hot summer days or the beach. It does run a bit big. I'll size down for the next one that I order.
I didn’t care for this one. I returned. Looked nothing like the pic
I love everything about this sundress and have 2 more already. I weigh 125 and 5ft 2in tall. It’s light weight for the humidity in Florida.
Absolutely beautiful dress, love the pockets, comfort, and beauty.

The dress is light and flowy but the material isn't too thin. I would normally wear a large but I sized up to an XL to be sure it wasn't too tight across the chest, and I'm glad I did. Ordering in a second color.

This has such a lovely cut, and there’s little need to wear a slip under because of the darker colors and fabric. Could be used for a night out or hanging around the house. It has adjustable straps as well. A great purchase!
LOVE this dress! I bought 2 in different patterns. Well made, fits perfect, lightweight. Nice for the summer
I was highly disappointed in this stress. The fabric is way too thin. The dress looks cheap. It is not comfortable. NOT bust friendly.  Cannot wear out in public. Should’ve returned.

I love this fabric! Soft & fluid. The cut and drape is perfect. I can't have too many black dresses. This is comfy for lounging at home, too wear to the beach, but it's also nice enough to goto a restaurant or shopping. I love a versatile look, as sometimes I'm not sure where the day will take me.
Love it! I want more in every color
Very comfy and flowy nice to put on first thing tomorrow n the morning to wear walking my dogs easy to put on … cannot see thru it bc it’s so flowy… size med 5’5. 135#
Got the blue tie dye and love it, but worried after reading reviews it might fall apart soon. Soft and cool summer beach fabric, super flattering. Hope it holds up!

I love these dresses! They are so comfortable and beautiful. They are so easy to throw on and look great. I have been wearing them all summer, and I hope to purchase more colors to wear throughout the Fall.

This has become one of my favorite Summer (warm weather) dresses. The material feels good, the flow is nice, and the pattern is pretty. It also washes well and can go in the dryer. My only wish is that it had pockets. I'm 5'5" and 175lbs. with a 40D bust. I ordered a L and it's perfect.
I love these so much I bought three of them. They are great for pear shapes. I lived in them all summer. Got lots of compliments.
I wear it as a dress and a coverup. I’ve gotten many compliments but it’s not very soft  Washes well

The dress is really right on the chart for the size, so anybody else out there who is looking to follow the reviews You don’t need to size up. So I sent it back and I ordered another one because it is really nice. It’s just so cute on I can’t tell you how much I love it. Can’t wait till the right size gets here.
Fits and flows great. Looks good.
The size is a touch bigger than actual size but it still fits well. It is light and cool for the hot summer days.
This dress fits very nicely! Great for the summer. Nice and flowy. The colors and print are nice and as pictured! I wore this dress yesterday and received several compliments.

评论概述: Love this lite weight and comfortable

Loved the fit, comfortable and flowing. Perfect light black dress for summer, will be getting another and the same in blue.

评论用户: Matthew’s writing craft, stories, and twists captivated me so much. I bought booked for my family members as well. He took me on a journey with a twist and a resolve be it humorous or reflective. I have since bought his two poetry books which are equally engaging. To see my 83 year old Mom laugh and be so engaged was heartwarming. My sister read it and we all simultaneously shared it. It’s a wonderful read and a great gift . I met Matthew at a Q&A event and he is such a nice friendly person all the more time support him. Can only share great things about this fantastic book full of short stories and a captivating read .

This dress is so comfortable- everyone must have on!!!
I love everything about it.  I got 2 for now Will order more.
Great price
Fits well, fabric is nice. Lovely handkerchief hem.
Fits perfectly; great summer dress
I gave this to my daughter as a gift. She loves it.  It looks lovely on her and she says it is Her most comfortable dress.
Very comfortable and love the adjustable straps

I purchased an XL. I have never written a review but I absolutely felt amazing in the dress. I’m 5’4 185lbs and have had 2 kids. This dress lays well. It doesn’t cling. The fabric is so light. It would be perfect for the beach. It felt like I was wearing a nightgown. The pattern looks just like the picture. I feel like if you’re someone who likes your clothes a little tighter you could get away with sizing down. But for me it was perfect.
I am 5’7” and 110 pounds and small chested. This dress looked like I was wearing a tablecloth. I returned it. It might look better on someone with a larger chest.
Probably looks spectacular on someone tall and thin.  Guess you figured that's not me lol.

评论概述: This will be my favorite Summer sundress!
评论详情: I am so delighted, over the top about this feminine,  floaty dress. I had ordered it to wear to a Polo match and party and was afraid it wouldn't come. It arrived today and when I opened the package, my heart sunk. I had ordered a Medium and it was a small. It fits perfectly, the length is what I had hoped. The fabric is soft and not transparent. It makes me feel sexy and free. I will definitely order another.

I love this dress so much. I returned to purchase a second one. I received so many compliments while wearing this. The colors are beautiful. I received the second dress. I ordered the purple one. To my surprise it is pink and purple. I looked at the picture again. The pink IS there however it is really hard to see it. I still like the dress but I didn’t want anyone else to be surprised like me.
A great buy for summer dress. Flowy and material is good as well as the print. Love it.

This is a beautiful dress.I've  received many omplimentsOn this dress.  There is no spandex in the material it is 100% rayon. Light and airy but not see through.  I have bought a total of 5 of them.  3 in the same color.  Anyhow, I love this dress  and wear it every day it's perfect  for the summer!!

Pretty dress, but within one wear the seam is completely frayed in a very noticeable area (front center v). Would not buy again, despite really liking the flow and looking of the dress. Save your money.
Really like the material length and how it flows on!!!

I love the print. I got the navy blue with red and coral floral print. The fabric is light and breathable. Best dress I have for hot temperatures. I got a size larger than usual and it was a size larger than I needed but shrunk down perfectly when washed and dried. Love it!

I wore this with espadrilles and gold jewelry for a dressier occasion, other times just beach walkers. Great material, not see through. No pockets, wah wah, but smooth silky fabric. I had to fix both straps, but I love the dress.
This dress is light and airy.  Feels very soft against your skin.  It is easy to wash and dry and it keeps its shape.  Would recommend this dress who wants to look sophisticated and stylish.
I have ordered three of these dresses.  They wash and dry well with with no wrinkles.  I perfect for summer!
Very pleased with this purchase, beautiful flowing lightweight very attractive, flattering beautiful colors  True to size
This dress is absolutely beautiful on. I’m wearing a size medium. The color is amazing… the fit is perfect. I could not be happier with this purchase.

This dress is so cute. The pattern is clear and the material is a very thin rayon that breathes so well and dries fast! Even though the material is thin, you can’t see through it ( I bought the navy blue, this may be different with other colors) I know it’s marketed as a swim cover, but I put a leather belt on and some heels and wore it to my cousin’s graduation party. I got so many compliments! I have also washed it about 5 times, no color bleeding, fading, or stitches coming undone in the wash

I love this dress.  Lightweight material isnt as soft or silky as I was expecting it to be but it still feels good against the skin. Loose but very flattering fit make it an ideal choice when it's hot AF out.  Asymmetric hem adds interest and helps set it apart from the many black dresses in my closet.  Overall  very versatileI bought this dress in my usual size (small) d it fit eactly like I expected.  I got it during the prime day sale for $25, which is a fair price for this dress in my opinion.Highly recommended if you can get it for $25 or less.  If you are willing to pay more, buy the version w/ pockets (also sold on Amazon).
Unlike other fabrics, this is a lightweight flowing rayon dress that is very soft and very comfortable with almost no weight. Excellent for hot summer days.
I ordered 4 of these and they all fit great! They are light weight but feel a bit silky against your skin. Easy to dress up or down. I got size small. I'm 5'3, 135lbs, 34DD. Love these dresses!
I got an extra large according to reviews, it's really big. But it may shrink and I love the style. Probably work for most body types. Just don't order a size up. Comfortable and soft.
These are awesome

I bought one of these dresses and it's so perfect for summer! Lightweight, breathable. I love it so much I bought two more in different patterns! I'd give five stars, but I was sitting on the couch one day and all of a sudden one of the straps broke! I was so glad I wasn't in public. Now I carry safety pins in my purse just in case of another wardrobe malfunction. Amazon replaced the dress right away.
Love this dress. True size. Soft material. Very comfortable!
Great in every way! I’m plus sized So flattering

I’ve been living in these dresses since I ordered them, they are sized up so I just added a belt to give me more shape

It is well made and looks just like the pictures.  I used a wrinkle spray and the wrinkles responded beautifully.  It doesn't really wrinkle while wearing it either.  I got many compliments.  Definitely worth the price. Very comfortable and true to size.
This dress is adorable, comfy and flattering! It's so cute with a white tee under. It's so amazing and keeps me cool in the heat. I want every color!
Fits great, it’s a midi that’s a maxi on me. Material is sheer, suggest a cotton half slip, but you do you.
